text: {| |} The Héros ("hero") was a 74-gun ship of the line of the French Navy, built by Joseph Chapelle at Brest and launched in 1752 In 1755, the Héros, under captain de Kermabon, took part in the Canadian campaign in the Bullion de Montlouet squadron. She was wrecked off le Croisic and scuttled at the Battle of Quiberon Bay, the 21 September 1759. Category:Ships of the line of the French Navy Category:Shipwrecks of the Biscay coast Category:1752 ships Category:Maritime incidents in 1759
title: French ship Héros (1752)
